title: The Pier
overview: The Pier follows the highs and lows of life on Llandudno Pier during the summer of 2021 as life begins again in this Victorian seaside gem.In this series we share Adam's love affair with this Victorian masterpiece and meet the men and women who keep so many of our seaside traditions alive - the stall keepers, food vendors, entertainers, boatmen and hoteliers who combine to make a day at the Welsh seaside such a magical and unforgettable experience.
